backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing game rooms, player stats, user profiles, and leaderboard with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization for authentication and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (authentication, lobby system, turn-based combat, leaderboard, visual theme) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of all frontend files describing tactical military-themed UI components, authentication system, game lobby, turn-based combat board, and leaderboard implementation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space for tactical military palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Fire Fight application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for game lobby, game board, and leaderboard, wrapped in theme provider with authentication guards.
frontend/src/components/ActionPanel.tsx: Card component displaying Move and Attack action buttons for turn-based gameplay with disabled state management.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication wrapper component that displays loading or login prompt states when user is not authenticated, otherwise renders protected children.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright notice and caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameGrid.tsx: Interactive 10x10 grid battlefield component displaying player positions with clickable cells for movement and selection.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with Fire Fight logo, navigation links to lobby and leaderboard, login button, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Hero banner component displaying Fire Fight title and Tactical Combat Arena tagline with background styling.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardTable: Displays a ranked table of players with their scores, showing trophy icons for top 3 positions and truncated principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login/logout states using Internet Identity, with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/PlayerToken.tsx: Displays a player card with avatar, name, health bar, and visual indication of active status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name before accessing the game.
frontend/src/components/RoomCard.tsx: Card component displaying game room information (ID, player count, status) with a join button that navigates to the game room.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend mutations (save profile, create/join room, set position) and queries (leaderboard) with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with tactical military-themed color palette for light/dark modes, custom animations, and component styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GameBoard.tsx: Main game board component that renders a tactical combat interface with a 10x10 grid, player tokens, turn management, and action panel for move/attack commands.
frontend/src/pages/GameLobby.tsx: Game lobby page displaying available rooms with player counts, allowing users to create new rooms or join existing ones, with user profile integration.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Leaderboard page that fetches and displays player rankings in a table format with loading states and trophy icon header.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, typography with Rajdhani display font, tactical-themed shadows, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (authentication, lobby, combat, leaderboard, visual theme) and pending health/damage system feature request.
